verses.roman:
eteka kahite prabhu vihvala ha-ilā
loka vidāya karite prabhu dhairya dharilā

synonyms: eteka kahite—saying this; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vihvala ha-ilā—became overwhelmed; loka vidāya karite—to bid farewell to the devotees; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhairya dharilā—maintained patience.
translation: While describing all this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was a little overwhelmed, but just to finish bidding farewell to the devotees, He remained patient.
